exhibit.description: At Payne Elementary School, we are dedicated to creating a learning environment that cultivates young minds. Our mission is to equip our students with the tools needed to make informed decisions and become productive members of a global society. At Payne, we aim to integrate the learning of 21st Century skills into all subject areas through the use of technology and study of countries and diverse cultures. Our highly qualified staff is committed to providing standards-based instruction in a safe and supportive environment that builds self-esteem and promotes self-discipline, motivation and excellence.
